name: Is it wrong to try to pick up aliens in a mine?
name_original: Is it wrong to try to pick up aliens in a mine?
description:
You will play as a miner who got trapped in a mine due to a collapse. Now you will have to follow the instructions of an operator to leave the mine safely. Unfortunately his map of the mine is outdated so may not always be telling you the right way to go

Programmer, composer & level designer: Crazy474747

Artist & Animator: Contykpo

   Game made for the community jam if you like our game or have a constructive opinion please write a comment :)

Controls -

Esc - Pause

The character controls are the opposite than those of the dialogues and change in almost every level (Except for the mouse ones, those are always  the same)
